<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is a callable that manages file caching operations. It accepts a task</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ID \\p Task, a unique key \\p Key, and a module name \\p ModuleName, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// returns AddStreamFn(). This function determines whether a cache hit or miss</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// occurs and handles the appropriate actions.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Task, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a98c6256d0644613c6b5b3e2ef06ef5ce">Key</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/modulename">ModuleName</a>)&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This type represents a file cache system that manages caching of files.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It encapsulates a caching function and the directory path where the cache is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// stored. To request an item from the cache, pass a unique string as the Key.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For hits, the cached file will be added to the link and this function will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// return AddStreamFn(). For misses, the cache will return a stream callback</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// which must be called at most once to produce content for the stream. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// file stream produced by the stream callback will add the file to the link</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// after the stream is written to. ModuleName is the unique module identifier</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for the bitcode module the cache is being checked for.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Clients generally look like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if (AddStreamFn AddStream = Cache(Task, Key, ModuleName))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ProduceContent(AddStream);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// CacheDirectoryPath stores the directory path where cached files are kept.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Create a local file system cache which uses the given cache name, temporary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// file prefix, cache directory and file callback.  This function does not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// immediately create the cache directory if it does not yet exist; this is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// done lazily the first time a file is added.  The cache name appears in error</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// messages for errors during caching. The temporary file prefix is used in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// temporary file naming scheme used when writing files atomically.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;FileCache&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af73b4fcac77298355025a0e5975edcf0">localCache</a>(</span></CodeLine>
